mapper.select: /* getTargetListActivePage */ select t.tg_id, t.title, t.descript , t.tg_url, t.tg_url_param1, t.tg_url_param2, t.tg_url_param3 , t.regdate, t.regid, t.stat , t.param1, t.param2, t.param3, t.param4, t.param5 , p.ps_id, p.ps_add_url, p.ps_tag, p.dest_field #, p.regdate, p.regid , p.priority, p.ps_type, p.descriptp, p.dest_charset from conf_target_orig t left join conf_ps_mapping_ORIG m on m.tg_id = t.tg_id left join conf_preset_ORIG p on p.ps_id = m.ps_id #where t.stat = 'Y' order by t.tg_id ASC, p.priority ASC #limit ${pageSize} offset ${offsetIdx}

/* getTargetListReadyToAnalyzePage */ select t.tg_id, t.title, t.descript , t.tg_url, t.tg_url_param1, t.tg_url_param2, t.tg_url_param3 , t.regdate, t.regid, t.stat , t.param1, t.param2, t.param3, t.param4, t.param5 , p.ps_id, p.ps_add_url, p.ps_tag, p.dest_field , p.regdate, p.regid , p.priority, p.ps_type, p.descriptp, p.dest_charset from conf_target_orig t left join conf_ps_mapping_ORIG m on m.tg_id = t.tg_id left join conf_preset_ORIG p on p.ps_id = m.ps_id where t.stat = 'Y' order by t.regdate DESC, p.priority ASC limit ${pageSize} offset ${offsetIdx}

/* getTargetListByStat */ select t.tg_id, t.title, t.descript , t.tg_url, t.tg_url_param1, t.tg_url_param2, t.tg_url_param3 , t.regdate, t.regid, t.stat , t.param1, t.param2, t.param3, t.param4, t.param5 , p.ps_id, p.ps_add_url, p.ps_tag, p.dest_field , p.regdate, p.regid , p.priority, p.ps_type, p.descriptp, p.dest_charset from conf_target_orig t left join conf_ps_mapping_ORIG m on m.tg_id = t.tg_id left join conf_preset_ORIG p on p.ps_id = m.ps_id where t.stat = #{stat} order by t.regdate ${orderType}, t.tg_id ${orderType}, p.priority ASC limit ${pageSize} offset ${offsetIdx}

/* getTargetListActiveLast10 */ select t.tg_id, t.title, t.descript , t.tg_url, t.tg_url_param1, t.tg_url_param2, t.tg_url_param3 , t.regdate, t.regid, t.stat , t.param1, t.param2, t.param3, t.param4, t.param5 , p.ps_id, p.ps_add_url, p.ps_tag, p.dest_field , p.regdate, p.regid , p.priority, p.ps_type, p.descriptp, p.dest_charset from conf_target_orig t left join conf_ps_mapping_ORIG m on m.tg_id = t.tg_id left join conf_preset_ORIG p on p.ps_id = m.ps_id where t.stat = 'Y' order by t.regdate ASC, p.priority ASC limit 10 offset 0

/* getConfTargetOrigById */ select t.tg_id, t.title, t.descript , t.tg_url, t.tg_url_param1, t.tg_url_param2, t.tg_url_param3 , t.regdate, t.regid, t.stat , t.param1, t.param2, t.param3, t.param4, t.param5 , p.ps_id, p.ps_add_url, p.ps_tag, p.dest_field , p.regdate, p.regid, p.ps_type , p.priority, p.ps_type, p.descriptp, p.dest_charset from conf_target_orig t left join conf_ps_mapping_ORIG m on m.tg_id = t.tg_id left join conf_preset_ORIG p on p.ps_id = m.ps_id where t.tg_id = #{tg_id}
